summary: This document is an email correspondence regarding the agenda for a meeting scheduled on October 22, 2013, involving several individuals from Deutsche Bank. Tazia Smith requests a more client-friendly version of the meeting agenda, which is to be prepared by Monica Gilkinson.

persons.name: Tazia Smith
persons.context: Tazia Smith is coordinating the meeting agenda and requests a revised version for client use.

persons.name: Caroline Kitidis
persons.context: Caroline Kitidis is involved in the preparation of the meeting agenda and instructs Monica to create a professional version.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is included in the email correspondence regarding the meeting agenda.

persons.name: Monica Gilkinson
persons.context: Monica Gilkinson is tasked with preparing a professional version of the meeting agenda.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is included in the email correspondence regarding the meeting agenda.

persons.name: Vahe Stepanian
persons.context: Vahe Stepanian is included in the email correspondence regarding the meeting agenda.

events.title: Meeting Agenda Preparation
events.description: Preparation for a meeting scheduled on October 22, 2013, involving key staff from Deutsche Bank.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 26th Floor, New York, NY 10154
keyFacts: The email correspondence is dated October 21, 2013.
Tazia Smith is the Director I Key Client Partners at Deutsche Bank Securities Inc.
The meeting agenda is to be revised for a more client-friendly version.
Monica Gilkinson is responsible for creating a professional version of the agenda.
The email indicates a level of confidentiality regarding the content.
